history.proof: intros s d H. unfold state_ref_ok_check in H. intros a p. intros H0. shelve.

exceptions.exn: In environment s : state d : preDTA H : (fix state_ref_ok_check (s : state) (d : preDTA) {struct s} : bool := match s with | @M0 _ => true | @M1 _ _ p => prec_list_ref_ok_check p d | @M2 _ x y => state_ref_ok_check x d && state_ref_ok_check y d end) s d = true a : ad p : prec_list H0 : MapGet prec_list s a = Some p Unable to unify "(fix state_ref_ok_check (s : state) (d : preDTA) {struct s} : bool := match s with | @M0 _ => true | @M1 _ _ p => prec_list_ref_ok_check p d | @M2 _ x y => state_ref_ok_check x d && state_ref_ok_check y d end) s d = true" with "prec_list_ref_ok p d".

chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof, without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Sovle This Proof State:

Hypotheses:


Goal:
forall (s : state) (d : preDTA), state_ref_ok_check s d = true -> state_ref_ok s d

Premises:
Inductive bool : Set := true : bool | false : bool
preDTA = Map state : Set
state_ref_ok = fun (s : state) (d : preDTA) => forall (a : ad) (p : prec_list), MapGet prec_list s a = Some p -> prec_list_ref_ok p d : state -> preDTA -> Prop
state_ref_ok_check = fix state_ref_ok_check (s : state) (d : preDTA) {struct s} : bool := match s with | @M0 _ => true | @M1 _ _ p => prec_list_ref_ok_check p d | @M2 _ x y => state_ref_ok_check x d && state_ref_ok_check y d end : state -> preDTA -> bool
state = Map prec_list : Set
state_ref_ok_check_correct : forall (s : state) (d : preDTA), state_ref_ok s d -> state_ref_ok_check s d = true
state_ref_ok_M2_destr : forall (s0 s1 : state) (d : preDTA), state_ref_ok (M2 prec_list s0 s1) d -> state_ref_ok s0 d /\ state_ref_ok s1 d
preDTA_ref_ok_def : forall d : preDTA, preDTA_ref_ok d < -> (forall (a : ad) (s : state), MapGet state d a = Some s -> state_ref_ok s d)
preDTA_ref_ok_distinct = fun d d' : preDTA => forall (a : ad) (s : state), MapGet state d a = Some s -> state_ref_ok s d' : preDTA -> preDTA -> Prop
state_in_dta = fun (d : preDTA) (s : state) => exists a : ad, MapGet state d a = Some s : preDTA -> state -> Prop
prec_in_dta = fun (d : preDTA) (p : prec_list) => exists (s : state) (a c : ad), MapGet state d a = Some s /\ MapGet prec_list s c = Some p : preDTA -> prec_list -> Prop
preDTA_ref_ok = fun d : preDTA => forall (a : ad) (s : state) (c : ad) (pl : prec_list) (b : ad), MapGet state d a = Some s -> MapGet prec_list s c = Some pl -> prec_occur pl b -> exists s0 : state, MapGet state d b = Some s0 : preDTA -> Prop
state_in_dta_diff = fun (d : preDTA) (s : state) (a : ad) => exists b : ad, MapGet state d b = Some s /\ a <> b : preDTA -> state -> ad -> Prop
prec_list_ref_ok_check_correct : forall (p : prec_list) (d : preDTA), prec_list_ref_ok p d -> prec_list_ref_ok_check p d = true
prec_list_ref_ok_check_complete : forall (p : prec_list) (d : preDTA), prec_list_ref_ok_check p d = true -> prec_list_ref_ok p d
prec_in_dta_cont = fun (d : preDTA) (p : prec_list) => exists (s : state) (b c : ad) (p0 : prec_list), MapGet state d b = Some s /\ MapGet prec_list s c = Some p0 /\ prec_contained p p0 : preDTA -> prec_list -> Prop
prec_in_dta_diff = fun (d : preDTA) (p : prec_list) (a : ad) => exists (s : state) (b c : ad), MapGet state d b = Some s /\ MapGet prec_list s c = Some p /\ a <> b : preDTA -> prec_list -> ad -> Prop
prec_in_dta_diff_cont = fun (d : preDTA) (p : prec_list) (a : ad) => exists (s : state) (b c : ad) (p0 : prec_list), MapGet state d b = Some s /\ MapGet prec_list s c = Some p0 /\ prec_contained p p0 /\ a <> b : preDTA -> prec_list -> ad -> Prop
prec_list_ref_ok = fun (p : prec_list) (d : preDTA) => forall a : ad, prec_occur p a -> exists s : state, MapGet state d a = Some s : prec_list -> preDTA -> Prop
prec_list_ref_ok_destr : forall (a : ad) (la ls : prec_list) (d : preDTA), prec_list_ref_ok (prec_cons a la ls) d -> prec_list_ref_ok la d /\ prec_list_ref_ok ls d
prec_in_state = fun (s : state) (p : prec_list) => exists c : ad, MapGet prec_list s c = Some p : state -> prec_list -> Prop
FSetPositive.PositiveSet.exists_1 : forall (s : FSetPositive.PositiveSet.t) (f : FSetPositive.PositiveSet.elt -> bool), SetoidList.compat_bool FSetPositive.PositiveSet.E.eq f -> FSetPositive.PositiveSet.Exists (fun x : FSetPositive.PositiveSet.elt => f x = true) s -> FSetPositive.PositiveSet.exists_ f s = true
FSetPositive.PositiveSet.xexists_spec : forall (f : FSetPositive.PositiveSet.elt -> bool) (s : FSetPositive.PositiveSet.t) (i : FSetPositive.PositiveSet.elt), FSetPositive.PositiveSet.xexists f s i = true < -> FSetPositive.PositiveSet.Exists (fun x : FSetPositive.PositiveSet.elt => f (FSetPositive.PositiveSet.rev_append i x) = true) s
ZMicromega.Vars.Facts.MP.Dec.F.mem_iff : forall (s : FSetPositive.PositiveSet.t) (x : FSetPositive.PositiveSet.elt), FSetPositive.PositiveSet.In x s < -> FSetPositive.PositiveSet.mem x s = true
ZMicromega.Vars.Facts.equal_trans : forall s s' s'' : FSetPositive.PositiveSet.t, FSetPositive.PositiveSet.equal s s' = true -> FSetPositive.PositiveSet.equal s' s'' = true -> FSetPositive.PositiveSet.equal s s'' = true
ZMicromega.Vars.Facts.subset_mem_1 : forall s s' : FSetPositive.PositiveSet.t, (forall a : FSetPositive.PositiveSet.elt, FSetPositive.PositiveSet.mem a s = true -> FSetPositive.PositiveSet.mem a s' = true) -> FSetPositive.PositiveSet.subset s s' = true
ZMicromega.Vars.Facts.union_subset_3 : forall s s' s'' : FSetPositive.PositiveSet.t, FSetPositive.PositiveSet.subset s s'' = true -> FSetPositive.PositiveSet.subset s' s'' = true -> FSetPositive.PositiveSet.subset (FSetPositive.PositiveSet.union s s') s'' = true
FSetPositive.PositiveSet.subset_2 : forall s s' : FSetPositive.PositiveSet.t, FSetPositive.PositiveSet.subset s s' = true -> FSetPositive.PositiveSet.Subset s s'
FSetPositive.PositiveSet.subset_1 : forall s s' : FSetPositive.PositiveSet.t, FSetPositive.PositiveSet.Subset s s' -> FSetPositive.PositiveSet.subset s s' = true
FSetPositive.PositiveSet.equal_2 : forall s s' : FSetPositive.PositiveSet.t, FSetPositive.PositiveSet.equal s s' = true -> FSetPositive.PositiveSet.Equal s s'
ZMicromega.Vars.Facts.MP.Dec.F.filter_iff : forall (s : FSetPositive.PositiveSet.t) (x : FSetPositive.PositiveSet.elt) (f : FSetPositive.PositiveSet.elt -> bool), SetoidList.compat_bool eq f -> FSetPositive.PositiveSet.In x (FSetPositive.PositiveSet.filter f s) < -> FSetPositive.PositiveSet.In x s /\ f x = true
state_in_dta_M0_false : forall s : state, ~ state_in_dta (M0 state) s
prec_list_ref_ok_check = fix prec_list_ref_ok_check (p : prec_list) (d : preDTA) {struct p} : bool := match p with | prec_cons a la ls => addr_in_dta_check d a && (prec_list_ref_ok_check la d && prec_list_ref_ok_check ls d) | prec_empty => true end : prec_list -> preDTA -> bool
addr_in_dta_check = fun (d : preDTA) (a : ad) => match MapGet state d a with | Some _ => true | None => false end : preDTA -> ad -> bool
taille_1 = fix taille_1 (s : state) : nat := match s with | @M0 _ => 0 | @M1 _ _ y => taille_0 y | @M2 _ x y => PeanoNat.Nat.max (taille_1 x) (taille_1 y) end : state -> nat
FSetPositive.PositiveSet.equal_spec : forall s s' : FSetPositive.PositiveSet.t, FSetPositive.PositiveSet.Equal s s' < -> FSetPositive.PositiveSet.equal s s' = true
FSetPositive.PositiveSet.Subset = fun s s' : FSetPositive.PositiveSet.t => forall a : FSetPositive.PositiveSet.elt, FSetPositive.PositiveSet.In a s -> FSetPositive.PositiveSet.In a s' : FSetPositive.PositiveSet.t -> FSetPositive.PositiveSet.t -> Prop
DTA_ind : forall P : DTA -> Prop, (forall (p : preDTA) (a : ad), P (dta p a)) -> forall d : DTA, P d
DTA_rec : forall P : DTA -> Set, (forall (p : preDTA) (a : ad), P (dta p a)) -> forall d : DTA, P d
DTA_rect : forall P : DTA -> Type, (forall (p : preDTA) (a : ad), P (dta p a)) -> forall d : DTA, P d
preDTA_ref_ok_distinct_dest : forall d0 d1 d : preDTA, preDTA_ref_ok_distinct (M2 state d0 d1) d -> preDTA_ref_ok_distinct d0 d /\ preDTA_ref_ok_distinct d1 d
FSetPositive.PositiveSet.Equal = fun s s' : FSetPositive.PositiveSet.t => forall a : FSetPositive.PositiveSet.elt, FSetPositive.PositiveSet.In a s < -> FSetPositive.PositiveSet.In a s' : FSetPositive.PositiveSet.t -> FSetPositive.PositiveSet.t -> Prop
ZMicromega.Vars.Facts.MP.Dec.F.add_iff : forall (s : FSetPositive.PositiveSet.t) (x y : FSetPositive.PositiveSet.elt), FSetPositive.PositiveSet.In y (FSetPositive.PositiveSet.add x s) < -> x = y \/ FSetPositive.PositiveSet.In y s
ZMicromega.Vars.Facts.MP.Dec.F.equal_m = fun (s s' : FSetPositive.PositiveSet.t) (H : FSetPositive.PositiveSet.Equal s s') (s'' s''' : FSetPositive.PositiveSet.t) (H0 : FSetPositive.PositiveSet.Equal s'' s''') => (let b := FSetPositive.PositiveSet.equal s s'' in if b as b0 return (FSetPositive.PositiveSet.Equal s s'' <-> b0 = true -> FSetPositive.PositiveSet.Equal s' s''' <-> FSetPositive.PositiveSet.equal s' s''' = true -> b0 = FSetPositive.PositiveSet.equal s' s''') then let b0 := FSetPositive.PositiveSet.equal s' s''' in if b0 as b1 return (FSetPositive.PositiveSet.Equal s s'' <-> true = true -> FSetPositive.PositiveSet.Equal s' s''' <-> b1 = true -> true = b1) then fun (_ : FSetPositive.PositiveSet.Equal s s'' <-> true = true) (_ : FSetPositive.PositiveSet.Equal s' s''' <-> true = true) => eq_refl else fun...
FSetPositive.PositiveSet.Exists = fun (P : FSetPositive.PositiveSet.elt -> Prop) (s : FSetPositive.PositiveSet.t) => exists x : FSetPositive.PositiveSet.elt, FSetPositive.PositiveSet.In x s /\ P x : (FSetPositive.PositiveSet.elt -> Prop) -> FSetPositive.PositiveSet.t -> Prop Argument scopes are [function_scope _]

intros a p.
